summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2430, for the improvement of north side of Seneca Street, from 7th Avenue to 9th Avenue, by constructing wood walk and concrete walks; and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 25566 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
